nodes.text: Bulwark was a planet located in the Bulwark system of Wild Space. During the Galactic Civil War, Bulwark served as a Rebel Alliance safe world—a designated planet where people connected with the Alliance could live free of Imperial oppression. It was also among the few sites to which the Rebels allocated one of their v-150 Planet Defender ion cannons.

Bulwark was mentioned in the 1996 second edition of Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back, a sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The second edition expanded on the sourcebook's original text with new and revised content by author Pablo Hidalgo.
The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Bulwark system, and therefore the planet itself, in grid square U-7.
